document.body:
Home Ask Question Recent Questions Popular Questions Top Experts Log In Sign Up Home » Tickets and Accidents »Question
What are the laws regarding car booting in Tennessee? If no signs are clearly posted, how can I dispute a fee?
Additional Details
I was booted for parking in a fast food restaurant parking lot which had gone out of business. The sign at the entrance was not properly attached and could not be read (tow truck driver agreed). Do signs have to be posted, and if so, what actions can I take against the towing company?
Asked in Tickets and Accidents - 1073 days ago
Tags: What are the laws regarding car booting in Tennessee If no signs are clearly posted how can I dispute a fee Report abuse UTChris Rate this : 1 0
